element.definition: Identifies the 'type' of resource - equivalent to the resource name for other resources.
element.comments: Because resource references will only be able to indicate 'Basic', the type of reference will need to be specified in a Profile identified as part of the resource.  Refer to the resource notes section for information on appropriate terminologies for this code.
element.requirements: Must be able to distinguish different types of "basic" resources.

binding.description: Codes for identifying types of resources not yet defined by FHIR
